widget.label: Social Links
widget.description: A widget that will contain links to social accounts. An empty URL will hide the link in the shop view.

parameter.name: display_text
parameter.label: Text to Display
parameter.description: Select if you want the social network name (e.g. "Facebook", "Twitter" etc.) or your username in the link. If you select 'both', then you will need to control which is showing using CSS. Also using CSS, you could replace the text with an icon.

parameter.name: twitter
parameter.label: Twitter
parameter.description: Enter your Twitter username, without '/', '@' or '#'

parameter.name: facebook
parameter.label: Facebook
parameter.description: Enter your Facebook username, without '/', '@' or '#'

parameter.name: pinterest
parameter.label: Pinterest
parameter.description: Enter your Pinterest username, without '/', '@' or '#'

parameter.name: youtube
parameter.label: YouTube
parameter.description: Enter your YouTube username, without '/', '@' or '#'

parameter.name: snapchat

parameter.description: Enter your Snapchat username, without '/', '@' or '#'

parameter.name: tiktok
